findings.title: Potential Reentrancy Risk in deposit() and withdraw()
findings.description: The 'checks-effects-interactions' principle is violated in the withdraw() function of FarmBoosterProxy, which may lead to re-entrancy attacks.

findings.title: Incorrect Index Value Used in remove()
findings.description: The `remove()` routine in the `IterableMapping` library updates the index incorrectly, leading to potential issues.

findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the PancakeSwap FarmBooster protocol, there is a privileged account, i.e., owner that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the system-wide operations.
